external_games.name: Crossbow: The Legend of William Tell
Crossbow: The Legend of William Tell

name: Crossbow: The Legend of William Tell
summary: You play William Tell, a hero in his homeland; a symbol of freedom looking for justice. To the Emperor though he is a dangerous spark that must be extinguished. To the resistance he is a figurehead, a powerful ally, if only they can persuade him to join with them. Aim well, the hopes of many are on your shoulders.
